snippet.title: Gimmick! Special Edition - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
The youkai Yumetaro is back in this special edition of the iconic Sunsoft NES gem, known for only have been released in Scandinavia and Japan!

Gimmick! Special Edition is developed by City Connection and includes brand new bonus features such as achievements, time attack mode, save, load, and rewind functions, gallery mode, and more. A physical version will also be available, published by Clear River Games.

Gimmick! Special Edition is coming to PC, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, and PlayStation 4!

Learn more: https://www.bitwavegames.com/news/gimmick-special-edition-hits-pc-and-modern-consoles-this-year

Follow Bitwave Games on Twitter and join our Discord for future updates:
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/bitwavegames
Discord: https://discord.gg/grnXdFTDXY
